.box-score {
  font-family: 'Roboto', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
}
.box-score a:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
}
.header {
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 20px;
}
.game-date {
  font-size: 16px;
}
.line-score {
  margin-top: 24px;
  text-align: center;
}
.line-score-tbl {
  margin: 0 auto;
  max-width: 500px;
  font-size: 15px;
}
.line-score-header {
  font-size: 13px;
  font-weight: 400;
}
.line-score-final {
  font-weight: 500;
}
.team-name {
  font-weight: 500;
}
.team-record {
  margin-left: 6px;
  color: hsl(0, 0%, 45%);
  font-size: 12px;
}
.box-score-title {
  margin-top: 24px;
  padding: 8px;
  background-color: hsl(205, 100%, 36%);
  color: hsl(0, 0%, 98%);
  font-size: 15px;
  font-weight: 400;
}
.box-score-tbl {
  font-size: 12px;
  letter-spacing: 0.2px;
}
.box-score-header {
  padding: 8px !important;
  border-bottom-width: 1px;
  background-color: hsl(205, 93%, 16%);
  color: hsl(0, 0%, 98%);
  font-weight: 400;
  font-size: 11px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  transition: box-shadow 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275);
}
.box-score-header:hover,
.box-score-header[aria-sort="ascending"],
.box-score-header[aria-sort="descending"] {
  background-color: hsl(205, 100%, 36%);
}
.box-score-header[aria-sort="ascending"] {
  box-shadow: inset 0 10px 0 -6px #efaa10 !important;
}
.box-score-header[aria-sort="descending"] {
  box-shadow: inset 0 -10px 0 -6px #efaa10 !important;
}
.sorted {
  background-color: hsla(0, 0%, 60%, 0.1);
}
.box-score-total {
  font-size: 13px;
  font-weight: 500;
}



/* rmarkdown html documents */
.main-container {
  max-width: 1024px !important;
}
h1.title {
  display: none;
}
/* pkgdown articles */
.contents {
  width: inherit;
}

articles.title: Batting Records
articles.description: A collection of various records throughout our history!
articles.contents:
Best Batting

# A tibble: 5 x 7
  date      season     Batsmen      Score Balls    SR Opposition      
  <chr>     <chr>      <chr>        <chr> <dbl> <dbl> <chr>           
1 09/12/20… 2019 Spri… Michael Drew 60*      38  158. Workers Club Li…
2 11/11/20… 2019 Spri… Jimmy Day    56       30  187. The Hunts       
3 14/01/20… 2021 Summ… Michael Drew 56       40  140  The Hunts       
4 21/01/20… 2021 Summ… Kaushik Gay… 55*      31  177. Major Paine     
5 25/02/20… 2021 Summ… Michael Drew 55*      27  204. The Hunts       

Runs
Most Runs (all time)

# A tibble: 5 x 4
  Batsmen       Innings  Runs   Avg
  <chr>           <int> <dbl> <dbl>
1 Jimmy Day          23   804  53.6
2 Michael Drew       17   645  80.6
3 Ben Cull           21   445  31.8
4 Adam Peel          23   441  22.0
5 Daniel Dymond       8   268  67  

Most Runs (season)
